physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 9 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#437, USO - JWB Rocky Mntn Area, Denver Co. Jerry Paley, area director, Sun. Nov. 20 BMH Synagogue 1580 Gaylord St., Denver. Discussion on one of the topics presented by the panel at the 4th annual JWB area armed services conference. Over 70 participated from the military, communities and the Out of Town USO and JWB national and regional offices. Col. Harry Triesten JWB 5th Army area Chairman facing camera. undated. Donor Mrs. Rose Lorig, Colorado Springs from the personal papers of Mrs. Mildred Reibscheid.''

mods.abstract: Several unidentified individuals, some of the men in uniform, at a meeting of the USO and Jewish Welfare Board Rocky Mountain area. The meeting was held at Beth HaMedrosh Hagodol in Denver, Colorado. Col. Harry Triesten, JWB 5th Army area chairman sits facing the camera.
